column3:
I think the previous comment location was correct, as it is not only about this line, but all the lines that follow (the BOOST_FOREACH block below, which populates the vector). The few lines above is also needed for that.

Adding `std::` only here is a bit pointless, the whole file uses vector, set, pair etc. unqualified. Even the `pair` on the same line is not qualified.
Maybe a separate PR
This is already done (for the entire file) by @kallewoof in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9643
